ChatApp.error_admin_can_ban_user: Only admin can ban a user
ChatApp.error_message_time_interval: You can send message one by {{count}} miliseconds
ChatApp.socket_disconnected: Your socket is disconnected, Reconnect again.
ChatApp.connection_lost_description: The connection to the chat was interrupted. Attempting to reconnect...

JoinRoomModal.error1: You are already in this room
JoinRoomModal.error2: You can't join into this room. You banned by owner
JoinRoomModal.error3: You can't join into this room. over users

CreateRoomModal.room_name_descr: Please keep in mind that your room name is permanent and offensive words are restricted.
CreateRoomModal.category_descr: Help people understand what your room is about by choosing the most appropriate category.
CreateRoomModal.description_descr: This brief summary of your room will appear under your room name on your room page and other areas of the site. The limit is 80 characters.
CreateRoomModal.welcome_message_descr: This is a welcome message shown to users when they enter your chat room. The limit is 700 characters.
CreateRoomModal.max_users_descr: Help people understand what your room is about by choosing the most appropriate category.
CreateRoomModal.password_descr: Password protect your room. People can only join your room in they know the password.
CreateRoomModal.icon_descr: This icon will display on your chat room page and chat sidebar. 160x160 is the recommended size for this image.
CreateRoomModal.cover_descr: This image will show up at the top of your chat room page. 800x200 is the recommended size for this image.

LoginPage.session_expired: Your session expired, Please login again.

UserActionArea.sent_broadcast_request: Your request to view was sent to {{owner}}, Please wait for response
UserActionArea.error_not_broadcast_video: This user didn't create broadcast video
UserActionArea.you_are_already_watching_the_broadcastin: You are already watching the broadcasting video
UserActionArea.error_guest_dont_have_permission: Guest user can't send private message

SettingModal.size_descr: Adjust the size of messages in the chat.
SettingModal.join_room_descr: Display notification messages when people join or leave a chat room.

SidebarLeft.error_not_support_this_browser: Broadcasting is not supported with this browser
